document.description: The place is dirty. I had to go on a hunt to find a clean table. Their condiments come in plastic... ... Why would I rate a fast food restaurant? Easy, the same ...

Carl's Jr. http://www.dexknows.com/business_profiles/carl_s_jr_-l803554193/ (818) 998-0188 9861 De Soto Ave , Chatsworth , CA 91311 34.249619 -118.58902 Send to Phone Visit Website View Menu Write a Review Reviews by Raffi I. - 12/15/2011
Sorry to disappoint you Carl.... first time here and it was a bad customer service experience. Not coming back to this one. I ordered the monster biscuit which includes the best of both worlds...... Read Full Review on Yelp.com. by Kevin J. - 10/31/2011
I have been going here 3 or 4 days a week for months because it's the only place within walking distance to get a salad. At least 60% of the time for months now they can't get my order right. Then in... Read Full Review on Yelp.com. by Anna G. - 05/10/2011
There is not much to say about a fast food joint, but for the record, they did get our order wrong. The place is dirty. I had to go on a hunt to find a clean table. Their condiments come in plastic... Read Full Review on Yelp.com.
